summary: Hi! I'm Md. Nazmul Hasan Majed — a passionate Full Stack Web Developer, Programmer, and Software Engineer. I specialize in building modern, responsive web applications using technologies like React.js, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and MySQL. With a solid foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I bring creativity, performance, and problem-solving to every project. Whether it’s designing user interfaces, writing scalable backend APIs, or integrating payment gateways like Stripe, I thrive on turning ideas into digital reality. I'm also skilled with tools like Git, Firebase, VS Code, and platforms like Vercel and Netlify. I value clean code, great design, and continuous learning.
